newsitem.title: UK: European veg oil prices little changed at close.
newsitem.headline: European veg oil prices little changed at close.

text.p: European vegetable oil prices ended a holiday-affected session little changed on Friday.
Traders said the usual end of week lethargy had been exacerbated by Moslem Eid al-Adha holidays in Malaysia, Singapore, Indonesia and the Philippines.
"As expected nothing happened in palm oil and lauric oils owing to the holiday in the Far East," said one trader.

Higher Chicago futures at the opening had little impact on the soft oils market where Dutch soy oil finished 0.50 guilders up to 0.25 guilders down and rape oil 0.50 guilders lower in tradeless markets.
Crude palm oil cif Europe and refined oil fob Malaysia closed unchanged to $2.50 higher, unchanged from midday.
Coconut oil was unchanged across the board while palmkernel oil was $2.50 higher.
